home_main_title: Create Magical Children's Stories in Minutes
home_subtitle: Describe your story idea, and let our AI bring it to life with beautiful text and illustrations. Perfect for bedtime stories, classroom adventures, and sparking imagination!
home_magic_in_action_subtitle: Watch how easy it is to create a beautiful storybook.
home_community_garden_subtitle: The latest magical tales from our creative authors
home_features_title: Unlock a World of Magical Features
home_features_subtitle: Everything you need to create, share, and enjoy unforgettable stories.
home_feature_ai_story_desc: Turn simple ideas into fully illustrated storybooks with our powerful AI engine.
home_feature_narration_desc: Bring stories to life with professional audio narration in multiple languages and voices.
home_feature_cast_desc: Design unique characters with their own look and personality to star in your tales.
home_feature_community_desc: Share your creations with a vibrant community and get inspired by other storytellers.
home_feature_stickers_desc: Unlock and collect beautiful stickers from the illustrations in every story you create.
home_feature_creativity_desc: Track your progress with author levels, maintain creative streaks, and complete daily quests.
home_join_us: Join thousands of parents and educators creating amazing stories. Your first story is on us!
login_page_subtitle: Log in to continue creating magical stories
login_page_no_account: Don't have an account? Sign up for free
signup_page_subtitle: Join our community and start creating today.
signup_page_have_account: Already have an account? Log in here
dashboard_adventure_prompt: What new adventure will you create today?
dashboard_empty_bookshelf_desc: It's time to fill it with magical tales and heroic adventures. What will you create first?
create_page_subtitle: Fill in the details below, or get some inspiration!
create_page_character_placeholder: e.g., A brave little fox named Finn
create_page_plot_placeholder: e.g., Finn has to find a hidden treasure to save his family
create_page_generate_images_desc: Create a beautiful illustration for each page.
book_viewer_not_found_desc: We couldn't find the pages for this story.
dialog_delete_story_message: This will send "{{title}}" on a one-way trip to the land of forgotten tales. This action cannot be undone!
my_cast_page_subtitle: Create your own reusable characters! Design their look and personality, and add them to any story.
my_cast_character_desc_placeholder: Describe their appearance and personality. e.g., 'A fluffy brown bear wearing a tiny red cape. He's curious, kind, and loves honey cakes.'
my_cast_empty_desc: Create your first character and get them ready for their debut story.
my_cast_dialog_delete_message: This will permanently remove "{{name}}" from your cast. They can't be brought back!
community_page_subtitle: Explore a forest of tales grown by authors just like you. Pick a book and get inspired!
community_page_empty_desc: No stories have been published yet. Be the first to plant a seed!
sticker_book_coming_soon_desc: Your magical sticker collection will live here! Soon, you'll be able to see all the wonderful characters you've unlocked from your storybook adventures.
sticker_book_create_story_button: Create a New Story to Unlock Stickers
credits_page_subtitle: Unlock more stories with our new, affordable credit packs!
toast_story_generated_desc: Your new magical tale is ready to be explored.
toast_credits_error: Not enough credits to perform this action.
toast_coming_soon_video_desc: The promo video is being polished by our magical elves. Check back soon! ðŸš€
toast_payment_success_desc: Your credits have been added. Let the magic continue!
toast_publish_success_desc: Your story is now visible in the Community Garden.
toast_email_not_confirmed_desc: Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to log in.
toast_welcome_back_desc: You're now logged in and ready to create amazing stories!
toast_passwords_no_match_desc: Please make sure both passwords are the same.
toast_signup_success_title: Welcome to AI Story Garden! ðŸŽ‰
toast_signup_success_desc: Your account has been created. Please check your email to verify your account.
toast_my_cast_missing_details_desc: Please provide a name and description.
toast_my_cast_image_fail: Character image could not be generated.
toast_community_fetch_error_desc: Couldn't load the stories from the garden. Please try again.
toast_narration_error_desc: Could not play the audio file.
toast_narration_fail_desc: Could not generate or play audio: {{error}}
toast_story_not_found_desc: The story you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.
toast_pdf_generating_desc: Please wait while we create your beautiful ebook.
toast_pdf_success_desc: Your ebook has been successfully downloaded.
toast_auth_error_desc: You must be logged in to make a purchase.
toast_payment_error_desc: Could not redirect to checkout. Please try again.
toast_inspiration_desc: A fun new story idea has been filled in for you.
toast_wishing_well_desc: Your story idea is ready. Just add characters and a setting!
toast_remix_desc: Your story has been loaded. Time to add a new twist!
toast_character_ready_desc: {{name}} is ready for their close-up! Just add a plot and setting.
toast_not_logged_in_desc: Please log in to create a story.
toast_hiccup_desc: Something went wrong while creating your story. Please try again.
meta_title_landing: AI Story Garden - Create Magical Children's Stories in Minutes
meta_description_landing: Transform your imagination into beautiful, illustrated children's storybooks with AI. Perfect for parents and educators.
meta_description_dashboard: Your personal dashboard to manage and read your AI-generated storybooks.
meta_description_my_cast: Create and manage your personal cast of characters for your stories.
meta_description_community: Explore a garden of magical stories created by our community of authors.
meta_title_sticker_book: My Sticker Book - AI Story Garden
meta_description_sticker_book: Collect and view all your magical stickers unlocked from your stories.
meta_description_credits: Purchase credits to create more magical storybooks with AI Story Garden.
meta_title_create_story: Create a New Story - AI Story Garden
meta_description_create_story: Bring your story idea to life. Describe your character, plot, and setting, and let our AI do the rest.
alt_promo_thumbnail: Promo video thumbnail showing a magical storybook creation process
alt_empty_stage: An empty stage with a single spotlight
